chat.chatbot_intro: You can access various large model platforms by configuring the API Key, reference documents using the @ symbol, or choose workspace documents as the conversation context.

input.docContextTip: Use matched document fragments from the workspace as the conversation context
input.imageNotSupported: The current model does not support image input
input.imageSizeLimit: Please do not upload images larger than 1MB
input.modelNotSupported: This model does not currently support this feature
input.noModel: You haven't set a model, would you like to set one?
input.webSearchTip: Use the internet search, available for some models

message.systemStopped: The system has stopped this response

chat.no_models_added: You haven't added any models yet

confirmDeleteAll: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all documents?

history.saveTimeTip: A new history record will be added if the save time exceeds 10 minutes

insertLink.placeholder: Enter a link or search for a document

insertMedia.domainAccessNote: Please ensure the link allows cross-origin access

media.alignTip: Only effective when the image width is not full width

title.duplicateFileName: A file with the same name already exists
title.noSpecialChar: Please do not include special characters "/" in the file name

export.description: Inkdown will export to the local folder in <tag>GitHub Flavored Markdown</tag> format. File attachments will be saved in the <tag>.files</tag> folder.

importFolder.autoConvert: . Inkdown will automatically convert file path links and dependent images.
importFolder.existingIgnored: Existing file paths will be ignored

keyboard.reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all shortcuts?
keyboard.shortcut_tip: Use the combination key [âŒ˜/Ctrl/Alt/Shift] + other hotkeys to customize shortcuts

model.add_model_tip: Adding a model enables LLM conversation capabilities, and you can use documents, workspaces, or local files as context.
model.advanced_settings_tip: If you are not very familiar with the parameters, it is not recommended to configure or check them.
model.api_provider_help: Many models are compatible with OpenAi's API. If your model is not listed, consider using the OpenAi mode.
model.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?
model.creativity_help: The higher the value, the more creative and imaginative the response; the lower the value, the more rigorous the response.
model.frequency_penalty_help: The higher the value, the more diverse and rich the vocabulary; the lower the value, the more simple and straightforward the vocabulary.
model.max_history_count_help: Based on the last update time, only the most recent conversation records are retained.
model.max_rounds_help: One question and answer is considered one round. If the number of rounds exceeds the maximum, earlier conversation records will be ignored in the context.
model.model_placeholder: Add models using Enter, multiple models can be added
model.name: Name
model.presence_penalty_help: The higher the value, the more inclined to use different expressions, avoiding repetition of concepts; the lower the value, the more inclined to use repeated concepts or narratives, making the expression more consistent.
model.top_p_help: Considers how many possibilities to take into account. The higher the value, the more open to a variety of possible responses; the lower the value, the more inclined to choose the most likely response. It is not recommended to change this along with creativity.

noDocuments: No documents have been created yet

note.fileExistsInTarget: A file with the same name already exists in the target folder.
note.restoreFromTrash: You can restore this file from the trash.

semanticSearch: Use text vectors for semantic fuzzy search

settings.reduce_filename_input: Reduce Filename Input Box Size in Editor
settings.show_outline_help: Level 1 to 4 headings in the document will generate an outline on the right side of the editing area.
settings.title: Settings
settings.use_dollar_formula_help: Enter $content$ and use the last $ character to convert the content into an inline formula.

specialCharError: Please do not include special characters

workspace.bindFolderTip: After setting the workspace binding folder, you can use the "Show in Finder" feature
workspace.cancelWriteHint: After canceling, files will no longer be written to this folder in real-time
workspace.deleteHint: Permanently delete workspace documents and related media files
workspace.directoryTip: After selecting a folder, documents and attachments will be written to the folder in real-time
workspace.directoryUsed: This directory is already in use by another workspace
workspace.minSpaceHint: At least one workspace must be retained
workspace.name: Workspace Name
